description: Overview Dashboard for Windows using Prometheus and Windows Exporter

panels.title: The network details of the maximum traffic network card of each host
The maximum disk read and write details of each host
Details of the maximum disk IO of each host

targets.expr: (sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$instance"}) by (instance) - sum(windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$instance"}) by (instance)) / sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$instance"}) by (instance) * 100

title: Windows_Status
